pullRequest.title: DB-9068 Use Java serialization for user defined aggregates
pullRequest.bodyText: It seems we are not serializing these objects to disk, so I wasn't able to test the upgrade logic. If you can come up with an scenario where we'd store them on disk let me know.

commit.message:
DB-9068 Use Java serialization for user defined aggregates

Kryo won't have the classes registered and would fail

nodes.bodyText: Minor issue - license header is missing

assertThat(res, allOf(containsString("a"), containsString("b"), containsString("c"), containsString("d")))
would bring a better error message.
